title: DataPorts - Booking schema
description: Provide the bookings electronic messaging description

bookingNumber.description: Property. Unique ID of the booking

originalWindowFrom.description: Property. Originally booked time window to enter

actualWindowFrom.description: Property. Time window actually used, if arrival was 15’ earlier

originalWindowTo.description: Property. Originally estimated time window to leave

windowDate.description: Property. Date of the time window

containersImport.description: Property. Number of containers to drop-off to the CT yard

containersExport.description: Property. Number of containers to pick-up from the CT yard

exportContainer1.description: Property. Unique container ID for 1st container to be picked-up

exportContainer2.description: Property. Unique container ID for 2nd container to be picked-up

importContainer1.description: Property. Unique container ID for 1st container to be dropped-off

importContainer2.description: Property. Unique container ID for 2nd container to be dropped-off
